movie.title: The Lightship
movie.description_intro: Just when US Coast Guard captain Miller takes his teenage son Alex to his lightship off the coast of Virginia, Calvin Caspary and two criminal accomplices, on the run for the police, decide to hijack it. What the crazy trio didn't count on is that this small crew doesn't just keep taking it lying low, they will put up a fight. Alex hides dad's gun and wrestles his his war past and courage.
movie.description_full: Just when US Coast Guard captain Miller takes his teenage son Alex to his lightship off the coast of Virginia, Calvin Caspary and two criminal accomplices, on the run for the police, decide to hijack it. What the crazy trio didn't count on is that this small crew doesn't just keep taking it lying low, they will put up a fight. Alex hides dad's gun and wrestles his his war past and courage.

movies.title: Hunky Dory
movies.summary: In the heat of the summer of 1976, keen drama teacher Vivienne fights sweltering heat and general teenage apathy to put on an end of year music version of Shakespeare's The Tempest. To engage her students, she uses hits of the time, which will be performed by a fresh young cast led by rising star Aneurin Barnard.

To engage her students, she uses hits of the time, which will be performed by a fresh young cast led by rising star Aneurin Barnard.

movies.title: Land of Glass
movies.summary: A children's fantasy movie about a friendship between a 13-year-old boy and a fairy. Jas finds a little girl and her grandmother in the stable at the end of the week when his parents leave him alone on the home farm. It turns out that they are elves that have found shelter in his stable from hunters who pervade the elves in the woods and try to take away the pearl that gives them magical power and thus life.

movies.title: A World of Worlds
movies.summary: An evil warlock now rules the magical planet Ressear. To conquer her fallen empire Sofia Hayden must find the legendary Royal 4 reincarnated bodies.
movies.description_full: An evil warlock now rules the magical planet Ressear. To conquer her fallen empire Sofia Hayden must find the legendary Royal 4 reincarnated bodies.

movies.title: One Chance
movies.summary: Director David Frankel (The Devil Wears Prada (2006), Marley & Me (2008)) teams with Screenwriter Justin Zackham (The Bucket List (2007)) to tell the story of amateur opera singer Paul Potts (James Corden), who went from meek shop clerk to international superstar after his stunning performance on Britain's Got Talent (2007) became a viral video phenomenon.
